data.text:
When I was younger, I was bad at making my own decisions. 
I only did what others asked me to.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Then one day, I saw a horse girl running a G1 race 
for the Triple Crown. It was then that I found it... 
I found something I wanted to devote myself to.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: F-Father... I... I think... I want to be a Triple Crown horse girl...
data.name: Young Bourbon

data.text: I see, I see. My little Bourbon wants the Triple Crown title.
data.name: Bourbon's Father

data.text: I still remember this moment like it was yesterday. My usually grumpy father actually smiled and looked happy.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Then give it your all. Aim for that Triple Crown.
data.name: Bourbon's Father

data.text:
My objective became one of the very few decisions 
I made for myself. It is the dream of my father and me.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
That's all of the data log I wanted to share with you, 
as my Master. Because it explains the foundation 
of my current self.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
It had been a few days since I became Mihono Bourbon's 
trainer. She finally explained the reason for her goal 
of the Triple Crown title in more detail.

Hearing the story of this indecisive girl finally making 
her own decision and finding something to long for... 
It got me a little emotional.

choices.text: I'll make it happen, with you!

data.text: We will, Master.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: I think I caught a glimpse of a smile.

My trainings are bearing fruit on her.  Still, since 
I became her trainer I've had multiple people 
tell me the same thing over and over...
What? Mihono Bourbon is going for the Triple Crown? How could you? She's clearly cut out for short races instead!
data.name: Rookie Trainer

data.text:
But, we don't listen to what others tell us. We'll prove 
them wrong and have them take back their words.
And so...

You want me to partake in a 2000 meters turf race in the 
Semiannual Race Meeting? I determined that the longest 
G1 race there, the Hopeful Stakes, is of that length.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
The Semiannual Meet is a race meeting at 
Tracen Academy where one may choose out of many 
different races. It draws in quite a lot of visitors.

choices.text: <size=36>Let's show everyone what you're capable of!</size>
choices.processed: <size=26><size=36>Let's show everyone what you're capable of!</size></size>

data.text:
Orders received. 
Response: I'm all for it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: And with that, we started training for the competition.
*huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
(1600 meters passed. 400 meters left. 
Pulse and breathing are within expected range.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: Keep going! Your times are improving!

data.text: Got it!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
With her teeth clenched, she ran and ran. 
It was like she was one with the wind.

And thus, the day of the event arrived. 
Crowds of people showed up, not just students. 
Many people came to visit.

Of course, Mihono Bourbon, 'the Hope of the Short Distance', 
became the talk of the town because of her switch 
to the medium distance event.

She ain't got no stamina, a longer distance is a no-go. 
I really doubt she's gonna finish the 2000 meters...
data.name: Rookie Trainer

data.text: How reckless. What is her trainer thinking?!
data.name: Experienced Trainer

data.text: Still, part of me was praying as I focused on the gate.
*clang*
And they're off for the 2000 meter turf race! Which horse girl is going to grab gold?
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
(Positioning successful. Executing 'maintaining the lead' 
and 'break away'. Aware of lap time. Breathing OK.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Mihono Bourbon is able to stay in the front! But how?!
data.name: Rookie Trainer

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Mihono Bourbon is leading the pack! As they exit the fourth corner, they're onto the final straight! The backmarkers are approaching!
data.name: Commentator

data.text: This is it!
data.name: Horsegirl

data.text: Mihono Bourbon finally lost her lead, with 100 meters to go!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
(One ahead, two approaching from behind. 
Little stamina left. A stabbing pain in my lungs and 
I can't concentrate... But I... I must...)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: I must...!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: What a climax! Four horse girls are battling for first, it's now or nothing!
data.name: Commentator

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
The four leaders are bolting towards the finish. 
It's a miracle they haven't collided...
But Mihono Bourbon crosses the goal first! Mihono Bourbon wins!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
A huge wave of excitement eminates from the trainers. 
They are all fixated on her. None of them had 
expected this outcome.

Who knew she would be so fast on the 2000 meters?! 
What an incredible performance by Mihono Bourbon!
data.name: Rookie Trainer

data.text: Looks like she's able to run medium distance races after all.
data.name: Experienced Trainer

data.text:
It was this day that 'the Hope of the Short Distance' 
turned into 'the Challenger of the Triple Crown!'

You managed first on the 2000 meters, 
even with your lack of stamina... I see...
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text: I have high hopes for you, Mihono Bourbon.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text: Goal accomplished. I won the 2000 meters on turf.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: After the race, she was still her usual emotionless self.

I know that what led her to this victory 
was her own tremendous effort.

Hard work is what surpasses talent. It once again goes 
to show that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

Big changes in breathing and sensation were logged. 
Assuming that confusion of unknown cause has occurred.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: <size=38>Your running has the power to give courage.</size>
choices.processed: <size=26><size=38>Your running has the power to give courage.</size></size>

choices.text: <size=38>Your running has the power to give courage.</size>
choices.processed: <size=26><size=38>Your running has the power to give courage.</size></size>

data.text:
I'm sure that we will continue to prove that hard work 
is more important than raw talent. And I hope that one day, 
she'll break free from her robotic self. Even just a little bit.

All I'm doing is racing to achieve my objective. 
Displays of emotion do not exist in my database.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
But if you say so, Master... 
Then perhaps, I can place my trust in those words.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Command accepted. Appending a new instance of Objective 
to the list. Current objectives for the Twinkle Series are: 
Achieving the Triple Crown... And providing proof of hard work.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I predict that what's to come won't be easy. 
But according to my calculations, we will have 
enough strength to overcome it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I am glad to have you as my trainer, Fathe―― 
My Master.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Seeing a slight blush on her cheeks, 
I felt that we grew even closer still.
